text: The California gubernatorial election, 1970 was held on November 3, 1970. The incumbent, Republican Ronald Reagan, won re-election over Democrat and Speaker of the Assembly Jesse "Big Daddy" Unruh. Reagan won 3,439,174 (52,83%) of the vote while Unruh won 2,938,607 (45.14%) of the vote.Gerardo Juan Galicia ==References== ==Other websites== * California Elections Page * Reagan Heritage Category:1970 in the United States Category:1970s in California Category:California gubernatorial elections
title: 1970 California gubernatorial election
